MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm to repair a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:19pm on the 19th of March 2021.
